model.name: WSN Join Network
model.author: Damian Rusinek
model.description:
The model several mechanisms that allow a node to join a multihop WSN in a secure way. It distinguishes two class of protocols: 1. Direct Join the Sink (DJS): a node joins directly through the sink. 2. Indirect Join the Sink (IJS): a node joins the network through intermediate nodes in order to reach the sink.
By default, ten new nodes try to join the network.
